# Photo Lab React - Project Setup

## Project Overview
React customer portal for photo ordering with cropping, cart, and checkout functionality.

## ✅ All Steps Completed

1. ✅ Copilot instructions file created
2. ✅ Scaffolded React project structure with Vite and TypeScript
3. ✅ Created authentication system with AuthContext, Login, Register pages
4. ✅ Created API service layer with axios for backend integration
5. ✅ Implemented CartContext for shopping cart state management
6. ✅ Built all page components (Albums, AlbumDetails, Cart, Orders)
7. ✅ Created shared components (Navbar, PhotoCard, CartItem, CropperModal, ProtectedRoute)
8. ✅ Set up React Router with protected routes
9. ✅ Added mobile-responsive CSS styling
10. ✅ Installed dependencies and verified build successfully

## Project Ready to Use

The development server is running at: http://localhost:3000

To start development:
- Run `npm run dev` to start the dev server
- Run `npm run build` to build for production
- Update `.env.local` with your ASP.NET backend API URL

See README.md for complete documentation.
